topic.title: Threshold Logging Tracing through the SDK

section.title: Threshold Logging in C SDK
section.p: Response Time Observability is implemented as Threshold Logging in libcouchbase from release 2.9.0.

row.entry: Boolean used to determine tracing is enabled. Defaults to using the ThesholdLoggingTracer if enabled. When false a Noop or similar tracing implementation should be used instead. Also when enabled the SDK will try and retrieve duration metrics from the server for KV operations.
The interval between executions that processes the collected operation spans. Expressed in seconds with fractions (or microseconds for lcb_cntl).
The maximum number of items to keep in internal queue per service.
The KV operation operation threshold. Expressed in seconds with fractions (or microseconds for lcb_cntl).
The View query operation threshold. Expressed in seconds with fractions (or microseconds for lcb_cntl).
